name: com.castsoftware.java.gcp
title: Google Cloud Platform for Java
description: Google Cloud Platform(GCP) is a suite of cloud computing services that runs on the same infrastructure that Google uses internally for its end-user products. Bigtable is a NoSQL database service offered by Google Cloud. Cloud Storage is a service for storing objects in Google Cloud. PubSub is an asynchronous and scalable messaging service that decouples services producing messages from services processing those messages. This extension supports the Google Cloud Bigtable, CloudStorage and PubSub services for Java.
